comments:
This happens with eclipse-SDK-20020312-win32.zip every time if I'm inside a method and I apply this 
action a few times.

more,
it throws this error:

I've seen this too, need a reproducable case

Just set the cursor inside a method block.
Then aplly the action "Expand Selection to Previous 
Element" a few times,
until the whole method block is selected.
Then apply the action once 
more and the error appears.
